SELECT CFRN_ID AS 'conferenceId' /*컨퍼런스ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD AS 'cfrnLocScnCd' /*장소코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD', A.CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD) AS 'cfrnLocScnNm' /*장소이름*/ ,CFRN_STRT_DT AS 'cfrnStrtDt' /*시작일*/ ,CFRN_FNH_DT AS 'cfrnFnhDt' /*종료일*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,(CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FILE_ID and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE A.ATTC_FILE_ID END) AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_CFRN A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITL_NM like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '%${rgstNm}%'
AND CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD = '${cfrnLocScnCd}'
AND CFRN_STRT_DT >= #{cfrnStrtDt}
AND CFRN_STRT_DT <= #{cfrnFnhDt}
ORDER BY CFRN_ID DESC

SELECT CFRN_ID AS 'conferenceId' /*컨퍼런스ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD AS 'cfrnLocScnCd' /*장소코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD', A.CFRN_LOC_SCN_CD) AS 'cfrnLocScnNm' /*장소이름*/ ,CFRN_STRT_DT AS 'cfrnStrtDt' /*시작일*/ ,CFRN_FNH_DT AS 'cfrnFnhDt' /*종료일*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,B.sa_name AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_CFRN A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER B ON A.RGST_ID = sa_user WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND CFRN_ID = #{conferenceId}
